getContent.description: This method returns a UI5 catalog viewer object.

requestSent.description: This event is fired when the Service Discovery sents a request to some data source

requestCompleted.description: This event is fired when the Service Discovery receives a response from the data source

serviceSelectionCompleted.description: This event is fired when a service in the Service Discovery is selected and validated

validateNextSent.description: This event is fired when a service in the Service Discovery is selected to Enable/Disable Next button
